release_note: New features: Audio calls now use the earpiece by default with an option to switch to speaker mode You can now send and receive locations with contacts Support for styling to add more _emphasis_ to your chats Detect and select a default telephony provider compatible with JMP.chat Cheogram In addition to the new features we ve made many small but important user interface improvements throughout the app. Some of the more notable fixes and improvements: Improved default pictures for contacts and groups The notification count badge on the home screen is more reliable Your display name is now synchronized if you have multiple devices The message input area is now scrollable handy if you are writing a long message Fixed some glitches that occur on iOS 15 We have also begun adding support for non English languages to the app. Hurra!
